TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000CZ13z:ref

Dear Team,

We installed & updated the mentioned below security updates on our EPP Server.
But still is showing for update in Live Update tab of EPP Server. So we are not in doubt that this update is done on our EPP Server.
Need help in checking whether this update is successfully installed on our EPP Server.

Update: EPP Server Hotfix #1 - Important Security Updates for EPP Server (HWA-EPP4-U8800)

[cid:f824b6f7-758f-4829-88c2-6800ccdfb8a6]





Regards,

TextBody:
Hello Pankaj,
 

Thank you for getting back to us.

Can you please check under the Live Update menu for the View applied updates button and let us know if the hotfix is present in there ?

If it is, then the patch has been successfully applied and the request to update it again will disappear after the EPP server update to 5.9.4.0
For the moment we do not have an ETA when the 5.9.4.0 version will be released.

Have a nice day ahead!

Best regards,
__________________
